      • addPos

        public void addPos(java.lang.String name,
          java.lang.String description,
          Argument.Type type)
        addPos adds an positional argument, an argument that is always required.
        Parameters:
        description - what it is
        name - the name of the key
        type - enum from class Argument that tells the program the datatype of the argument
        See Also:
